snippet: South Dakota State was delayed by a snowstorm for 10 hours at the Sioux Falls, S.D., airport on Friday on the way to play Western Illinois.
lead_paragraph: South Dakota State was delayed by a snowstorm for 10 hours at the Sioux Falls, S.D., airport on Friday on the way to play Western Illinois.

headline.main: South Dakota State Sacked by Snowstorm
headline.print_headline: South Dakota State Sacked by Snowstorm
